(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: My biological mother was a young unwed college graduate student and she decided to put me up for adoption.
sentences.chinese: 我的亲生母亲是一个年轻的没有结汇棠大学毕业生。

sentences.english: The system of compulsory exchange settlement and sales contributes greatly to the growth of foreign exchange .
sentences.chinese: 该系统的强制性结汇对外汇的增长作出了重大贡献。

sentences.english: Article 2 The administration of total annual amount shall apply to individual settlement and domestic individual purchase of foreign exchange.
sentences.chinese: 第二条对个人结汇和境内个人购汇实行年度总额管理。

sentences.english: Free Trade Zone, Frontier Inspection, commodity inspection, Payment Settling Bank, Shipping Market.
sentences.chinese: 保税区，边检，商检，结汇银行，船务市场。

sentences.english: Currently no large-scale repatriation of foreign exchange reserves and foreign exchange needs.
sentences.chinese: 目前我国外汇储备没有大规模调回并结汇的需要。

general trade (i.e. importing and export without processing)
